item.title: babel plugin tcomb
item.description: Recently I’ve found nice library to do dynamic type checking with flow syntax. It’s called https://github.com/gcanti/babel-plugin-tcomb It’s just babel plugin which parses flow types and converts them into dynamic asserts. Quite useful for testing IO boundaries.
